metadata.title: CVE-2024-24584 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple out-of-bounds read vulnerabilities exist in the readMSHfunctionality of libigl v2.5.0. A specially crafted .msh file can lead toan out-of-bounds read. An attacker can provide a malicious file to triggerthis vulnerability.This vulnerabilitty concerns the`readMSH` function whileprocessing `MshLoader::ELEMENT_TET` elements.

criterions.comment: slic3r-prusa package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
